titleStmt.title: SII 6.273: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 273. (A.R. No. 295 of 1897). ON THE NORTH AND WEST WALLS OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . śrīmaNmahāmaṇḍaleśvara Irājātirāja rājaparameśvara Ariyarāyavipāṭa pāṣaikkuttappuvarāyarkaṇṭa pūrvadakṣṇapaccimaUttirasamudrādipati śrīvīrapratāpa Accutaiyadevamahārāyaṟkuc cellāṉiṉṟa cakāṟtaM 1000 4 100 5 10 2ṉ mel cellāniṉṟa virotivaruṣaM paṅkuṉi 2 10 4 śrīmaNmahāmaṇḍaleśvara Āsurakaṇḍa Aśuraṉārāyaṇat tiyākamāsamutra Immaṭi torātta cintaiyadevamahārājar maṇimaṅka
laM vaṇṭuvarāpati Emperumāṉ pāṭiveṭṭai kaṅkarājāviṉ maṇṭapamum kayilāsanātaṟku ṉarasayar maṇṭapamum taṉmiśvaramuṭaiyanayiṉāṟku cintamairājāviN maṇṭapamum viṟṟirunta perumāḷukku kumāravasavappar maṇṭapamum mentu Iraṇṭu maṇṭapattile taṇṇīṟpantalum vaittu kaṅkākuḷattukku meṟku kaṅkarājāviṉ maṇṭapam Aḷavāka Iraṇṭu puṟamum cālaimaram vaittu maṇṭapattu muṉ toppu Uṇṭāṉatum marama payirākkavum cantaikkuppam
Ūravaraik kaṭṭaḷai Iṭukaiyil tāṅkaḷ namakkuk kuṭukkum vaṟttiṉaiyum vasavappar vaṟtiṉaiyum naracayar vaṟtiṉaiyum karaṇikkar vattiṉaiyum Uṇṭāṉa pala vattiṉaiyum Uṭpaṭa varuṣam Oṉṟukkuk kuṭuppatāṉa 2 10 4 Ippaṇam Irupattunālum tāṅkaḷe peṟṟukkoṇṭu yinta ṉālu maṇṭapamum toppuc cālaimaram Uṇṭāṉatu Ellām maramvaittup payiṟceyyak kaṭavarkaḷākavum Immatikārikkuc candrātittavaraiyum paṇṭirācākkaḷ candāṉaparamparaiyum naṭattakkaṭavomākavum taṅkaḷ Ūri
le kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭa ṭṭa 2 10 4 Aḻintu Āḷa Amañci Eṟcoṟu maṟṟum moru Āvaṉāyam Aṉṉiyāyam Eṉṟu koḷḷakkaṭavom Alla Intap paṇam Irupattunālum Irācakarattār pātiyum Ūrār pātiyum kuṭukkak kaṭaivomākavum Intat tarmmattukku yātoruvaṉ Ahitam paṇṇiṉavaṉṉuṇṭāṉāl taṅkaḷ mātāpitāvaiyum govataiyum prāmaṇaraiyum keṅkaik karaiyile koṉṟa toṣattile pokakkaṭaivaṉākavum taṉṉuṭaiya Apimānattai nicaṟku kuṭuttavaṉ .
Digital edition of SII 6.273 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
